statements: SELECT * FROM text_data;
SELECT id FROM text_data;
SELECT text_data FROM text_data WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM text_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM text_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, text_data FROM text_data WHERE text_data LIKE '%keyword%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, UPPER(text_data) AS upper_text FROM text_data WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM text_data WHERE text_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT id, text_data FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT text_data FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nlp_metadata ORDER BY data_language DESC;
SELECT id, data_language FROM nlp_metadata WHERE data_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT text_data FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, text_data FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE text_data LIKE '%positive%' AND id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT sa.id, sa.text_data, nm.data_language FROM sentiment_analysis_data sa JOIN nlp_metadata nm ON sa.id = nm.data_id WHERE nm.data_language = 'ENGLISH';
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM sentiment_analysis_data GROUP BY id HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT text FROM Sentiments WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TextData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text_id, sentiment_category FROM AnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive';
SELECT id, text FROM TextData WHERE text LIKE '%happy%';
SELECT * FROM Sentiments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text, sentiment_score FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT t.text, a.sentiment_category FROM TextData t JOIN AnalysisResults a ON t.id = a.text_id;
SELECT id, text FROM TextData WHERE text ILIKE '%positive%';
SELECT text, sentiment_score FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY text ASC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data;
SELECT text_data, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT source, date_published FROM text_metadata WHERE source = 'Twitter';
SELECT analysis_type, result_text FROM text_analysis_results WHERE text_id = 12345;
SELECT text_id, keyword, relevance_score FROM text_keywords WHERE relevance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY relevance_score DESC, keyword ASC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT text_data, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT source, date_published FROM text_metadata WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT analysis_type, result_text FROM text_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_type DESC
SELECT text_id, keyword, relevance_score FROM text_keywords WHERE keyword LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT id, text FROM StopWords LIMIT 10;
SELECT token, text_id FROM TokenizedText WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT word, sentiment_value FROM SentimentLexicon ORDER BY sentiment_value DESC;
SELECT text_id, sentiment_score FROM NLPResults WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive';
SELECT id, text, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT id, word FROM StopWords ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text_id, token FROM TokenizedText WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT word, sentiment_value FROM SentimentLexicon WHERE sentiment_value > 0.5;
SELECT text_id, sentiment_label, sentiment_score FROM NLPResults WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
